​

Passenger Travel Responsibility

  • ✓ Respect the Vehicle: Please help us keep the car clean. Avoid littering or leaving trash behind.
  • ✓ No Smoking/Alcohol: Consumption of alcohol and smoking is strictly prohibited inside the vehicle.
  • ✓ Punctuality: Please adhere to the scheduled pickup and drop-off timings to ensure a smooth journey.
  • ✓ Safety First: Always wear seatbelts while the vehicle is in motion. It is for your own safety.
  • ✓ Driver Interaction: Treat our drivers with respect. They are trained professionals here to serve you.
